# Example for making table:

```{r eval=FALSE}
table = data.frame(column1 = c(1, 2, "text"), 
                   column2 = c(4, 5, 6))

# Then for PDF:
kable(table, caption = "title here", digits = 2)

# For presentation:
datatable(table)
```
